item.title: $G$-type antiferromagnetic ${\mathrm{BiFeO}}_{3}$ is a multiferroic $g$-wave altermagnet
item.description:
Author(s): Andrea Urru, Daniel Seleznev, Yujia Teng, Se Young Park, Sebastian E. Reyes-Lillo, and Karin M. Rabe

Altermagnetic spin splitting is often missed by conventional band structure plots, as it often vanishes along the high-symmetry lines and planes in the Brillouin zone shown in these plots. Here, the authors introduce a novel band structure plotting method that incorporates high-symmetry and general lines to make the splitting apparent. A framework to classify the splitting in three dimensions and its nodal surfaces is also developed. These concepts are demonstrated in a theoretical study of altermagnetism in multiferroic BiFeO3.


[Phys. Rev. B 112, 104411] Published Mon Sep 08, 2025
